meanings.definition: A person who rides on a wave while standing or lying on a surfboard.
meanings.sent1: The surfer gracefully rode the wave on his surfboard.
meanings.sent2: The beach was filled with surfers enjoying the waves.
meanings.sent3: The surfer tried to ride a wave on a door, which was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: She was a surfer in the sea of paperwork, navigating through it effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The image of the surfer on the giant wave was etched in his memory.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in the sport of surfing.
meanings.sent1: Every weekend, the surfer heads to the beach to catch some waves.
meanings.sent2: The surfer's dedication to the sport was truly admirable.
meanings.sent3: The surfer challenged a dolphin to a surfing competition, which was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: She was a surfer in the ocean of challenges, always looking for the next big wave.
meanings.sent5: The surfer's passion for surfing was as deep as the ocean itself.
